category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ProductBOPAllocationCloningRule
preference.preference_description: Specifies the name of the cloning rule used for allocating from a product BOP to a plant BOP.System administrators can configure new cloning rules for specific use cases and modify this preference to use the new cloning rules for selected users. Valid Values: Accepts a valid cloning rule name.
